tool_description: Structures and documents technical, functional, and business requirements for the RFP in a standardized format.

project_id.description: Unique identifier for the RFP project

technical_requirements.description: List of technical specifications and constraints

compliance_standards.description: Industry standards and regulatory compliance requirements

error_messages: Invalid project ID: Project ID must be a valid string identifier from RFP Project Initializer.
Requirements list too long: Each requirement array must not exceed the maximum item limit.
Empty required arrays: Functional requirements, technical requirements, and performance criteria cannot be empty.
Duplicate requirements: Remove duplicate entries within requirement categories.
Invalid requirement format: Requirements should be clear, specific, and measurable statements.
usage: Provide project_id and required arrays for functional_requirements, technical_requirements, and performance_criteria. Add optional arrays for compliance, features, and integration needs. The tool structures requirements into standardized RFP format.

requirements_document_id.description: Unique identifier for the requirements document

compliance_summary.description: Summary of compliance and regulatory requirements
